verification_message:
🔹 Your account is not verified.

To get the 'Verified' status, write 'Verification' in the general support chat.

To go to the general support chat, go to the 'Support' section or use the button below.
how_to_create_nft_message:
To list your own NFT artwork üéÜ:
- Contact support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) and make a deposit.
- Support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) has the right to reject your request to display the artwork on the platform at its discretion.
- Your artwork should not offend anyone's interests; in such cases, support has the right to reject your request, and in repeated cases, it has the right to freeze your account for a period or impose a fine.

Best regards, OpenSea Administration!

crypto_deposit_message:
📍 For your convenience, we provide the option to top up your balance with {currency_title}. Please send any amount from {crypto_min_prices} {currency_title} to the unique address:

{crypto_address}

Our bot will automatically recalculate the current {currency_title} rate and credit the funds to your balance after the first network confirmation. You will receive a notification of the credit 🚀

Thank you for choosing our services! If you have any questions, please contact our support. 🌐
